price: Eegasii garee hunda irraa isaan Rahmaan irratti jallinatti irra cimoo ta’an ni baafna.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمۡ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عِتِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma lananziʿanna min kulli shīʿatin ayyuhum ashaddu ʿalā al-raḥmāni ʿitiyyan
